name: Zeus
text: On R: Lower the power of each card in your opponent's hand by 1.

name: Cyclops
text: On R: Discard your other cards here, gain +2 power for each discarded.

name: Aphrodite
text: On R: Lower the power of each enemy card here by 1.

name: Iris
text: EoT: Give your cards at each other location +1 power if they have unique powers.

name: Nyx
text: On R: Discards your other cards here, add their power to this card.

name: Atlas
text: EoT: Loses 1 power if your side of this location is full.

name: Mnemosyne
text: On R: Add a copy of the last card you played to your hand.
